name: Clone Knights
description:
You lead an army of knights and lead them along a path of adventure. Overcome dangerous traps and deep chasms in this colorful platformer about a brave warrior in armor. Your followers will repeat your every step, even if it is a step towards inevitable death. On your long journey you will encounter deep holes with spikes, high mountain ledges and a dense forest of mysteries.

Clone Knights is a platform game. Navigate across various platforms using high jumps and get to the end of the level to get to the next, much more difficult one. Lead your army to victory and watch your step, sire.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Funny minions
- Cheerful gameplay
